name: Agility Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 32 Skill Haste and 32% Attack Speed.

name: Brutality Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 320 Critical Hit and 32% Critical Damage.

name: Arcane Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 40% Overdrive Damage Boost and 200 Hit.

name: Attack Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain a 20% Attack.

name: Attack Speed Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 40% Attack Speed.

name: Break Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 400 Break.

name: Crit Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 400 Critical Hit.

name: Haste Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 190 Crit and 19% Attack Speed.

name: Hit Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 400 Accuracy.

name: Leech Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 13% Attack and 9.5% Lifesteal.

name: Magic Damage Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 30% Magic Damage.

name: Physical Damage Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 30% Physical Damage.

name: Swiftstorm Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 19 Skill Haste and 19% Critical Damage.

name: Blessing of Grace
effect: When present, increases 41.5% Attack and dual defenses for our Luminaries in [Grace] Status.

name: Efficiency Mastery
effect: When present, if an ally Luminary uses an Overdrive with Energy Consumption lower than the original, increases the Overdrive damage of this skill by 127.5%.

name: Graveyard Guardian
effect: While present, when our Luminary acquires [Deathrattle], it additionally provides a Shield equal to 16% of its maximum HP for 8 seconds.

name: Scorching Devastation
effect: When present, reduces enemy units' 62% Damage Reduction when they are in [Ignite] or [Evaporation] Status.

name: Ultimate Punishment
effect: While present, when our side triggers the [Punishment] effect on the enemy, it additionally deals Magic Damage equal to 740% of its Attack to the target.

name: Wild Advance
effect: While present, when our Luminary is in [Wild] status, additional 155% Attack Speed is increased.

name: Arcane Blessing
effect: When deployed, whenever an allied Luminary uses a skill, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their Attack. This effect can stack up to 3 times and lasts 6s.

name: Arcane Frenzy
effect: While present, when our Luminary consumes [Awakening], damage dealt is increased by 47% for 3 seconds.

name: Costly Bane
effect: When present, if an enemy Luminary uses an Overdrive with Energy Consumption higher than the original, reduces Overdrive Damage Boost by 62.5%.

name: Envigored Healing
effect: When present, if an ally Luminary gains [Morale], restores Health equal to 14% of their max Health and dispels 1 debuff.

name: Prey on the Weak
effect: When present, after an ally triggers the [Punishment] effect, there is a 92% chance to apply [Physical Defense Down] or [Magic Defense Down] to the punished target (based on the attacker's attack type).

name: Radiant Smite
effect: When present, if an ally Luminary enters the [Grace] Status, increases the Overdrive Damage Boost of their next Overdrive by 93%.

name: Shieldborn Rebirth
effect: While present, when our summoned unit dies, provides a shield equal to 18% of its maximum HP to one random allied Luminary for 6s and grants them [Attack Boost].

name: Summoning March
effect: While deployed, all allied summons gain 76% bonus Damage and Damage Reduction. Allied elite summons gain an additional 38% of bonus Damage and Damage Reduction.

name: Surging Impact
effect: When present, deals additional Magic Damage equal to 76% of the target's max HP to enemies affected by [Detonation] (up to 1520% of its own Attack).

name: Whisper of the Deathless
effect: When present, there is a 62.5% chance to summon a Whelpling at the location where an allied summon dies (up to 3 may exist at once). These Whelplings do not retrigger the effect upon death. Each inherits 40% of Attack and HP, and 100% of other stats, lasting for 12s.

name: Wild Medics
effect: While present, when our Luminary enters [Wild] status, it restores 40% of its maximum Health.

name: Winter's Wrath
effect: While on the field, enemy units afflicted with [Chill] or [Flash Freeze] suffer an additional 38% reduction in Attack.

name: Drain Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 310 Evasion and 20.5% Lifesteal.

name: Reflect Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 32% Healing effect and 21% Damage Reflection.

name: Block Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 400 Block.

name: Crit Resist Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 400 Critical Resistance.

name: Dodge Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 380 Evasion.

name: Flash Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 190 Evasion and 190 Block.

name: Healing Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 40% Healing effect.

name: Magic Block Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 200 Block and 20% Magic Defense.

name: Magic Defense Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 30% Magic Defense.

name: Physical Defense Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 30% Physical Defense.

name: Physical Resistance Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 190 Critical Resistance and 19% Physical Defense.

name: Shield Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 40% Shield efficiency.

name: Shield Resistance Aura
effect: While deployed, all allied units gain 30% Shield Efficiency and 200 Crit Resist.

name: Arcanist Roar
effect: After Dragonmight deals damage, inflict additional Magic Damage equal to 460% of Attack and apply a random [Stat Debuff] Status (once per target).

name: Furious Roar
effect: When Dragonmight heals allies, restores 31% Rage.

name: Healing Roar
effect: Dragonmight puts the target into the [Grace] status, restoring 46% of its max Health and granting 2 random [Stat Buffs].

name: Punishing Roar
effect: Dragonmight can trigger [Punishment]. When [Punishment] is triggered, it deals additional magic damage equal to 440% of Attack and inflicts [Silence] for 4 seconds. (Dragonmight can only trigger [Punishment] once per target)

name: Surging Roar
effect: When Dragonmight triggers an [Elemental Reaction], inflict [Stun] for 5.5 seconds.

name: Arcane Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, increases the allied team's Physical Defense by 33%. If a Luminary's Overdrive Energy Cost is 2 or less, also increases their Attack by 33% for 6s.

name: Boneclad Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, deal additional Magic Damage equal to 500% of Attack to all enemies. For each allied summon that dies during this battle, this damage is increased by 8% (up to a maximum of 80%).

name: Charging Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, the next 2 Basic Attacks deal additional Magic Damage equal to 630% of Attack and inflict [Ignite].

name: Desperate Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, restore HP equal to 26% of max HP to the Luminary of Wyrm with lowest HP percentage, granting them [Physical Defense Up] and [Magic Defense Up].

name: Dominating Roar
effect: After Dragonmight deals Damage, reduces the target's Critical Hit by 475. If the target's Overdrive Energy Consumption is not less than 4, additionally reduces the target's Critical Resistance by 475. The effect lasts for 6s.

name: Mana Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, boost all allies' Magic Damage by 46% for 6 seconds.

name: Mighty Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, boost all allies' Physical Damage by 46% for 6 seconds.

name: Pactbound Roar
effect: After unleashing Dragonmight, grant yourself and the Luminary with highest Attack a Shield equal to 25.5% of max HP plus [Attack Boost] for 8 seconds.

name: Pulsing Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, deal additional Magic Damage equal to 315% of Attack to all enemies.

name: Rallying Roar
effect: When Dragonmight targets units with [Morale], boost their Attack by an additional 63% for 6s.

name: Reincarnation Roar
effect: After the dragon summoned by Dragonmight dies, it deals Magic Damage equal to 155% of its own Attack to enemy units in a large circular area and restores HP equal to 10.25% of its own max HP to allied units in a large circular area.

name: Soulguard Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, grants 2 stacks of [Deathrattle] to the 2 allied Luminaries with the highest Attack and increases their Damage Reduction by 69% for 6s.

name: Vital Roar
effect: Upon unleashing Dragonmight, restore all allies' HP by an additional 25% of max HP.
